item.description:
Nashoba Valley Winery
invites you to "Tapeo-Nashoba style"
Tomorrow, Saturday, March 29
from 3:00 p.m. - 4:30 p.m.
Come Taste with Us!



Join us for a relaxing afternoon of shopping, tapas and wine tasting!


Come Taste with Us!
Savor the flavor!
"Tapeo-Nashoba style"

Saturday, March 29
from 3:00 p.m. - 4:30 p.m.
in our Wine Shoppe
No Advance Reservations Required

Big Fun, Big Flavor, Bring your Friends
While shopping in our wine shoppe
we invite you to enjoy
"Tapeo-Nashoba style"
Executive Chef, Steven Sprague of J's Restaurant
has once again created wine and food pairing magic.

The cost to enjoy "Tapeo-Nashoba style" is $7.50 per person.
The price includes a choice of
3 tapas along with a tasting of their wine pairing and
a commemorative Nashoba Valley Wine glass.
Tapas are available only between the
hours of 3:00 p.m. and 4:30 p.m.
in our Wine Shoppe

No Advance Reservations Required!

Come and explore a local winery!
See what makes us a truly unique New England Farm
and experience the ultimate palate sensory exploration.

Another great reason to visit the winery in March ....

MARCH WINE OF THE MONTH
Semi-Sweet Blueberry

The wine of the month for March is Semi-Sweet Blueberry. A medium bodied, rich, mellow wine with assertive blueberry aroma. Delicious as an aperitif, at the barbecue or with dessert. Purchase the Wine of the Month in the Wine Shoppe and receive an additional 10% off the price.
Our regular discounts also apply.

For more information call our Wine Shoppe at 978-779-5521
Open daily 10:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meetup at the fence by the pond directly across from The Wine Shoppe. If the weather is bad, we will meetup on the right side of the porch (main entrance). Look for the meetup logo
item.why: Events At Nashoba Valley Winery are always great!
item.name: Tapeo- Nashoba Style!
